briefTitle: Evaluation of Breast Cancer Screening Program at Assiut Governorate
officialTitle: Evaluation of Breast Cancer Screening Program in Assiut Governorate "Egyptian Women Health Initiative"
primaryOutcomeMeasure: 1-To evaluate the ability of breast clinical examination as screening tool to detect early and advanced stages of breast cancer.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:A multi-stage stratified random sampling technique will be used to select the sample. Sites providing breast cancer screening service at Assiut governorate will be classified into primary health care unit and secondary hospitals.

Primary health care units providing breast cancer screening service at Assiut governorate will be stratified in to rural, urban units. Two rural and two urban units will be randomly selected. Women at each unit will be classified according to age into below 38 years and above 38 years. A proportionate sample will be taken from each group.

-

Exclusion Criteria:age below 18 year.

-
